product_name: Serfas True 550 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: A lightweight choice for bike commuting and night rides, the Serfas True 550 front bike light emits a bright, 550-lumen beam and recharges at the USB port of your computer. Offers 2 hrs. in overdrive (550 lumens). 3 hrs 40 min. on high (330 lumens); 4 hrs. 40 min. on medium (230 lumens); 9 hrs. 30 min. on low (120 lumens), and 7 hrs. on flashing. The Serfas True 550 front bike light includes a USB charging cable, wall adapter, handlebar mount, helmet mount, and an interchangeable lens for standard or wide beam. Charge time with USB: 5 hrs. and 30 min.; charge time with wall charger 4 hrs. 195g light and 40g handlebar bracket weigh a total of 235g.
short_description: A lightweight choice for bike commuting and night rides, the Serfas True 550 front bike light emits a bright, 550-lumen beam and recharges at the USB port of your computer.
